name: Makes contact
description: User touches the target.  This triggers some abilities (e.g., []{ability:static}) and items (e.g., []{item:sticky-barb}).

name: Has a charging turn
description: This move has a charging turn that can be skipped with a []{item:power-herb}.

name: Must recharge
description: The turn after this move is used, the Pokémon's action is skipped so it can recharge.

name: Blocked by Detect and Protect
description: This move will not work if the target has used []{move:detect} or []{move:protect} this turn.

name: Reflectable
description: This move may be reflected back at the user with []{move:magic-coat} or []{ability:magic-bounce}.

name: Snatchable
description: This move will be stolen if another Pokémon has used []{move:snatch} this turn.

name: Copied by Mirror Move
description: A Pokémon targeted by this move can use []{move:mirror-move} to copy it.

name: Punch-based
description: This move has 1.2× its usual power when used by a Pokémon with []{ability:iron-fist}.

name: Sound-based
description: Pokémon with []{ability:soundproof} are immune to this move.

name: Unusable during Gravity
description: This move cannot be used in high []{move:gravity}.

name: Defrosts when used
description: This move can be used while frozen to force the Pokémon to defrost.

name: Targets opposite side in triples
description: In triple battles, this move can be used on either side to target the farthest away opposing Pokémon.

name: Heals
description: This move is blocked by []{move:heal-block}.

name: Ignores Substitute
description: This move ignores the target's []{move:substitute}.

name: Powder-based
description: Pokémon with []{ability:overcoat} and []{type:grass}-type Pokémon are immune to this move.

name: Jaw-based
description: This move has 1.5× its usual power when used by a Pokémon with []{ability:strong-jaw}.

name: Pulse-based
description: This move has 1.5× its usual power when used by a Pokémon with []{ability:mega-launcher}.

name: Ballistics-based
description: This move is blocked by []{ability:bulletproof}.

name: Mental effects
description: This move is blocked by []{ability:aroma-veil} and cured by []{item:mental-herb}.

name: Unusable during Sky Battles
description: This move is unusable during Sky Battles.

name: Dance
description: This move triggers []{ability:dancer}.

name: Affected by King's Rock
description: Pokémon holding a []{item:kings-rock} have a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.
